thread.title: No. 6 Clemson hands Miami worst loss ever, 58-0
thread.title_full: No. 6 Clemson hands Miami worst loss ever, 58-0

title: No. 6 Clemson hands Miami worst loss ever, 58-0
text:
> South Carolina No. 6 Clemson hands Miami worst loss ever, 58-0 Clemson defensive end Shaq Lawson, lower right, sacks Miami quarterback Brad Kaaya during the first half of an NCAA College football game, Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 in Miami Gardens, Fla. (AP Photo/Wilfredo Lee)
